Package teapot.rocket.components.body

Class Transition

java.lang.Object
teapot.rocket.components.Component
teapot.rocket.components.body.BodyComponent
teapot.rocket.components.body.Transition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Physical
public final class Transition extends BodyComponent
Represents a transition component used in rocket body construction.

This class extends BodyComponent and represents a transition section of a rocket body that connects different diameter sections or shapes.

The transition component contains inner components and specifies an inner diameter and transition shape for the rocket body.

The inner diameter and transition shape are critical parameters for defining the geometry and aerodynamic properties of the rocket body.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transition

      public Transition(ComponentBase componentBase, LinkedList<InnerComponent> inners, double innerDiameter, TransitionShape shape) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a transition with the specified base information, inner components, inner diameter, and transition shape.
      Parameters:
      componentBase - The base information of the transition.
      inners - The list of InnerComponent contained within the transition.
      innerDiameter - The inner diameter of the transition section.
      shape - The shape of the transition section.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the inner diameter is not positive.
